features.featureTitle: Remove the 'Add Funds' / 'Receive Money' form section from the Wallet screen (frontend/src/components/Wallet.tsx) that allows users to manually enter an amount and sender label to simulate receiving money. The collapsible form, its trigger button, and any related state variables should be deleted. The wallet balance display, transaction history, Transfer to Locker section, QR code (Receive modal), and Scan & Pay functionality must remain untouched.
